item.description: IA-175 East at IA-37 in Monona County. Use IA-37 East to Dunlap; IA-175 East to Castana and Mapleton.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East at US-83/SD-1806
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East at US-83/SD-1806 in Fort Pierre. Turn right for US-83 South/SD-1806 South. Turn left for US-83 North/US-14 East/SD-34 East. US-83 joins US-14/SD-34 East across the river into Pierre.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East Approaching US-83
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East approaching US-83 in Fort Pierre. Turn left to continue east on US-14/SD-34 and for US-83 north. US-83 joins US-14/SD-34 across the Missouri River into Pierre.

item.description: US-14/SD-34 East in Fort Pierre.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East at SD-1806

item.title: NV-361 North - Churchill County
item.description: Churchill County Line on NV-361 North. Milemarkers for both Mineral County and Churchill County are posted below the county line sign.

item.title: Welcome To California - CA-266 North
item.description: Welcome To California on CA-266 North. Taken at the Nevada-California State line. The mile marker for NV-266 is in the foreground. The state line is at the cattle guard.

item.description: Entering Sweetwater County on I-80 west. Milemarker 199.05.

item.title: I-80 West - North Platte River
item.description: I-80 west crossing the North Platte River in Carbon County. Milemarker 229.03 in the background.

item.title: Begin NV-767 North
item.description: Begin NV-767 North in the Ruby Valley. Milepost 37.18 Elko County.

item.description: Entering Johnson County on TN-67 east.

item.description: Milepost 0 (Nye County) on NV-375

item.title: Alt. US-93 South - Postmile
item.description: Postmile marker on Alt. US-93 south at the Elko - White Pine County Line. White Pine County 5.69 - US93A.

item.title: I-80 East - Milemarker 52
item.description: Mile 52 on I-80 east. This type of mile marker appears throughout Lyon and portions of Pershing County along I-80 and are recent in 2017.

item.title: US-24 East/CO-9 South - Hartsel
item.description: Entering Hartsel on US-24 East/CO-9 South.

item.title: US-24 East/US-285 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-24 East/US-285 North. Distance to Fairplay and Denver (via US-285), and Colorado Springs (via US-24).

item.title: CO-82 East - Top of the Rockies Scenic Byway
item.description: Begin Top of the Rockies Scenic Byway on CO-82 East.

item.title: I-5 South - Sexton Mountain Summit
item.description: I-5 south at Sexton Mountain Summit - Elevation 1960 Feet. This summit is one a series of passes I-5 crosses between Canyonville and Grants Pass in the Klamath Mountains. The milepost is also attached to the main sign.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 247
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 247 - Hardy Creek.

item.title: ID-75 North Approaching ID-21
item.description: Approaching ID-21 Junction on ID-75 North in Stanley. Milemarker 189.

item.title: ID-75 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-75 north. Distance to Stanley, Challis, and Salmon. Milemarker 129. The milemarkers on ID-75 continue reflect the distance from the Idaho-Nevada state line (via US-93) rather than the beginning of ID-75. Originally, ID-75 was signed as US-93.

item.title: US-50 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-50 west. Distance to Ruth, Eureka, and Austin.

item.title: US-93 North - Mile Marker
item.description: This is an unusual mile marker on US-93 north in Nevada. Typical mile markers in Nevada are much smaller and do not have a shield outline on them, just a text description of the route. There are two or there on this stretch of road between Wells and Lages Junction.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching I-80
item.description: US-95 north approaching I-80. Use I-80 East/US-95 North to Lovelock; use I-80 West/Alt. US-95 South to Reno. Turn left to enter the Rest Area. Notice the post mile marker at the base of the sign.

item.title: OR-36 West at Territorial Highway
item.description: OR-36 west at Territorial Highway south to Veneta and Elmira. Continue west on OR-36 for Mapleton and Florence.

item.title: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) North - Exit 7
item.description: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) north at Exit 7 - UT-105/Parrish Lane.

item.description: NM-518 north at NM-94 in San Miguel County.

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 24 - BL-10/US-70/East Motel Drive.

item.title: I-10 West - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico - Land of Enchantment on I-10 west. Taken at the Texas - New Mexico State Line.

item.title: US-550 North at NM-173
item.description: US-550 north at NM-173 west to Navajo Lake State Park.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 36
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 36 - Iyanbito.

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-119
item.description: UT-24 east at UT-119 west.

item.title: Milemarker at OR-31/US-395 Junction
item.description: Milemarker 120E at OR-31/US-395 junction. These type of milemarkers with the letter suffix have started to appear around Oregon. The letter indicates the segment of highway that the mileage is for. In Oregon, mile markers are posted according to internal highway, not posted route number (except for intersate highways). In this case the milemarker is for Fremont Highway. A posted highway can be composed of have multiple segments of internal highways.

item.title: US-160 East Approaching US-550
item.description: US-160 East approaching US-550. Turn right for US-160 East/US-550 South; left for Historic Downtown Durango.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 160
item.description: I-70 east at Exit 160 - BL-70/UT-19/Green River.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South at UT-123
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South at UT-123 in Carbon County.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South near Helper
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South near Helper. The sign beneath the shield designates this stretch of highway as a segment of Dinosaur Diamond Byway - part of America’s Byway System.

item.title: US-85 North Approaching SD-34
item.description: US-85 North approaching SD-34. Mile marker 54 is posted to the bottom of the marker.

item.title: I-90 East - Welcome To South Dakota
item.description: Welcome to South Dakota on I-90 east. Milemarkers for both Wyoming and South Dakota.

item.title: AZ-87 North Approaching AZ-260
item.description: AZ-87 north approaching AZ-260 at Milemarker 252.

item.title: Moffat County 10N - Wyoming-Colorado State Line
item.description: Moffat County 10N at the Wyoming-Colorado State Line. The mile marker below the highway shield is a standard Wyoming mile marker, and is for WY-430.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 6
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 6 - Bear River Drive. This is the eastern end of the Evanston business loop. Access to the Evanston Rest Area, Wyoming Welcome Center, and Bear River State Park.

item.title: I-80 East - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome To Nevada on I-80 east at the California-Nevada state line. I-80 through Nevada is called the Purple Heart Trail.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 392
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 392 - UT-13 South/Plymouth.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 290
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 290, Quealy Dome Road, 1/4 mile.

item.title: I-84 West - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on I-84 west at the ID-OR state line. The welcome sign on this border has an Oregon Trail theme.

item.title: I-80 West - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome To California, I-80 west. Milemarker 0 designates Mile 0 for Nevada.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 282
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 282 - To US-87 North/NW Bypass. For US-87 southbound traffic, it is easier to go through Great Falls.

item.title: AZ-389 East - Adopt A Highway and Milemarker
item.description: Adopt a Highway, state highway shield, and milemarker along AZ-398 east between Colorado City and Freedonia.
